fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may heal a player during the night, giving them Basic Defense and delaying their death until the end of the next night if they are hit with a stronger attack. You may not self-target.
- 1-shot: Operate on a member of the Crew, roleblocking them and giving them permanent Powerful Defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player whose death is delayed by your first ability will be informed that they are bleeding out. If they are healed by a Doctor, Lily, Potion Master, or similar role/ability before death, they will survive.
- A Crew member that has been Operated on will keep their Powerful Defense if they convert to a different Crew role.
